response.overview: After the Cuban Revolution, Che is at the height of his fame and power. Then he disappears, re-emerging incognito in Bolivia, where he organizes a small group of Cuban comrades and Bolivian recruits to start the great Latin American Revolution. Through this story, we come to understand how Che remains a symbol of idealism and heroism that lives in the hearts of people around the world.
response.tagline: The untold story of his final revolution
response.title: Che: Part Two

titles.title: チェ 39歳 別れの手紙
折古華拉 切39歲的告別信

cast.name: José Juan Rodríguez
cast.character: Moro (Octavio de la Concepción y de la Pedraja)
